unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Needed more than ever, especially with erratic monsoons these days. Heard about farmers in Maharashtra struggling after the 20/07/2023 floods. Wonder if Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana really works for chote kisan like Ramlal from my village. Heard mixed reviews during the gram sabha on 10/08/2023 at 15:00 hrs. Some got payouts, some didn't. Transparency is key, otherwise, its just a jumla like some say after 26/01/1950.
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Needed more than ever, especially with erratic monsoons these days. Heard about farmers in Maharashtra struggling after the twentieth july two thousand and twenty three floods. Wonder if Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana really works for chote kisan like Ramlal from my village. Heard mixed reviews during the gram sabha on tenth august two thousand and twenty three at three PM. Some got payouts, some did not. Transparency is key, otherwise, its just a jumla like some say after twenty sixth january nineteen fifty.
